'''Slight Distress''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[City of Winds and Idylls]]''.

It was first featured in an animated cutscene from the [[Archon Quest]] ''[[Knights of Favonius (Quest)|Knights of Favonius]]'', a dialogue scene in ''[[Wild Escape]]'', and later in various [[Story Quest]] scenes.
